query.default: select AssignmentId, Performer, EmployeeName, JobTitle, Department, Task, Subject, Author, AuthorName, Created, Deadline, Completed, CreatedTime, DeadlineTime, CompletedTime, IsRead, Status, Delay, DelaySort, AssignmentStatus, HyperLink, (select COUNT(1) from Sungero_Reports_AssCompletion as TotalAssView where TotalAssView.Performer = AssView.Performer and TotalAssView.ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId) as TotalCount, (select COUNT(1) from Sungero_Reports_AssCompletion as InProcessAssView where InProcessAssView.Performer = AssView. Performer and InProcessAssView.AssignmentStatus = @UndoneAndNotOverdue and InProcessAssView.ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId) as InProccesCount, (select COUNT(1) from Sungero_Reports_AssCompletion as CompletedAssView where CompletedAssView.Performer = AssView.Performer and CompletedAssView.AssignmentStatus = @DoneAndNotOverdue and CompletedAssView.ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId) as CompletedCount from Sungero_Reports_AssCompletion as AssView where AssView.ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId;

select emp.Id as EmployeeId, pers.ShortName as Name, pos.Name as JobTitle, case when dep.ShortName_Company_Sungero is not null and dep.ShortName_Company_Sungero <> '' then dep.ShortName_Company_Sungero else dep.Name end as Department, (select COUNT(1) from Sungero_Reports_AssCompletion where Performer = emp.Id and ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId) as Total, (select COUNT(1) from Sungero_Reports_AssCompletion where Performer = emp.Id and AssignmentStatus = @UndoneAndOverdue and ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId) as InProccesOverdue, (select COUNT(1) from Sungero_Reports_AssCompletion where Performer = emp.Id and AssignmentStatus = @UndoneAndNotOverdue and ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId) as InProcces, (select COUNT(1) from Sungero_Reports_AssCompletion where Performer = emp.Id and AssignmentStatus = @DoneAndOverdue and ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId) as CompletedOverdue, (select COUNT(1) from Sungero_Reports_AssCompletion where Performer = emp.Id and AssignmentStatus = @DoneAndNotOverdue and ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId) as Completed from Sungero_Core_Recipient emp left join Sungero_Company_JobTitle pos on emp.JobTitle_Company_Sungero = pos.Id left join Sungero_Core_Recipient department on emp.Department_Company_Sungero = department.Id join Sungero_Parties_Counterparty pers on emp.Person_Company_Sungero = pers.Id join Sungero_Core_Recipient dep on emp.Department_Company_Sungero = dep.Id where emp.Discriminator = 'b7905516-2be5-4931-961c-cb38d5677565' and emp.Status = 'Active' and (@DepartmentId = 0 or emp.Department_Company_Sungero = @DepartmentId) and (@PerformerId = 0 or emp.Id = @PerformerId) and (@BusinessUnitId = 0 or department.BusinessUnit_Company_Sungero = @BusinessUnitId);
